AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`el1`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`el1` union all select 'EL2' AS `EL2`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`team` AS `team`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`best_lap_time_raw` AS `best_lap_time_raw`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`best_lap_ms` AS `best_lap_ms`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`position` AS `position`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`year` AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`el2`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`el2` union all select AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`el4`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`el4` union all select 'WUP' AS `WUP`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`team` AS `team`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`best_lap_time_raw` AS `best_lap_time_raw`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`best_lap_ms` AS `best_lap_ms`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`position` AS `position`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`year` AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`wup`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`wup` union all select `best_lap_time_raw`,`formula1agodb`.`q1`.`best_lap_ms` AS `best_lap_ms`,`formula1agodb`.`q1`.`position` AS `position`,`formula1agodb`.`q1`.`year` AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`q1`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`q1` union all select 'Q2' AS `Q2`,`formula1agodb`.`q2`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`q2`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`q2`.`team` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`q4`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`q4`.`team` AS `team`,`formula1agodb`.`q4`.`best_lap_time_raw` AS `best_lap_time_raw`,`formula1agodb`.`q4`.`best_lap_ms` AS AS `PREQ1`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`team` AS `team`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`best_lap_time_raw` AS `best_lap_time_raw`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`best_lap_ms` AS `best_lap_ms`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`position` AS `position`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`year` AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal1`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`prequal1` union all select 'PREQ2' AS `PREQ2`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal2`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal2`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`prequal2`.`team` AS `GRILLE`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`team` AS `team`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`best_lap_time_raw` AS `best_lap_time_raw`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`best_lap_ms` AS `best_lap_ms`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`position` AS `position`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`year` AS `year`,`formula1agodb`.`grille`.`source_name` AS `source_name` from `formula1agodb`.`grille`

v_driver_points_tagged.view_definition: select `rps`.`season` AS `season`,`s`.`round` AS `round`,`rps`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`rps`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`rps`.`forename` AS `forename`,`rps`.`surname` AS `surname`,`rps`.`teams_name` AS `teams_name`,`rps`.`position` AS `position`,`rps`.`points` AS `points`,`scr`.`seg_id` AS `seg_id`,`scr`.`best_n` AS `best_n`,row_number() over ( partition by `rps`.`season`,`rps`.`driver_id`,`scr`.`seg_id` order by `rps`.`points` desc,`s`.`round`) AS `rk_in_seg` from ((`formula1agodb`.`v_race_points_shared` `rps` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `rps`.`race_id`)) join `formula1agodb`.`season_counting_rules` `scr` on(`scr`.`year` = `rps`.`season` and `s`.`round` between `scr`.`from_round` and `scr`.`to_round`))

v_lapstats.view_definition: select `lt`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`lt`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,count(distinct `lt`.`lap`) AS `nb_tours_enregistres`,sum(case when `lp`.`position` = 1 then 1 else 0 end) AS `nb_tours_en_tete`,sum(case when `lp`.`position` <= 3 then 1 else 0 end) AS `nb_top3`,sum(case when `lp`.`position` <= 6 then 1 else 0 end) AS `nb_top6`,sum(case when `lp`.`position` <= 10 then 1 else 0 end) AS `nb_top10` from (`formula1agodb`.`lap_times` `lt` left join `formula1agodb`.`lap_positions` `lp` on(`lp`.`race_id` = `lt`.`race_id` and `lp`.`driver_id` = `lt`.`driver_id` and `lp`.`lap` = `lt`.`lap`)) group by `lt`.`race_id`,`lt`.`driver_id`

v_race_points.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`rr`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`rr`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`bd`.`forename` AS `forename`,`bd`.`name` AS `surname`,`rr`.`teams_name` AS `teams_name`,`rr`.`position` AS `position`,coalesce(`ps`.`points`,0) + case when `py`.`bonus_fl` = 1 and `fl`.`driver_id` = `rr`.`driver_id` and (`py`.`fl_top_n` is null or `rr`.`position` <= `py`.`fl_top_n`) then `py`.`fl_points` else 0 end AS `points` from (((((`formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `rr`.`race_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`base_drivers` `bd` on(`bd`.`driver_id` = `rr`.`driver_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`points_years` `py` on(`py`.`year` = `s`.`year`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`points_scheme` `ps` on(`ps`.`scheme` = `py`.`scheme` and `ps`.`position` = `rr`.`position`)) left join (select `formula1agodb`.`mt`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`mt`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id` from `formula1agodb`.`mt` where `formula1agodb`.`mt`.`position` = 1) `fl` on(`fl`.`race_id` = `rr`.`race_id`)) where `rr`.`position` is not null and `rr`.`position` > 0

v_race_points_raw.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`rr`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`rr`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`bd`.`forename` AS `forename`,`bd`.`name` AS `surname`,`rr`.`teams_name` AS `teams_name`,`rr`.`position` AS `position`,coalesce(`ps`.`points`,0) AS `base_points`,case when `b`.`enabled` = 1 and `fl`.`driver_id` = `rr`.`driver_id` and (`b`.`top_n_limit` is null or `rr`.`position` <= `b`.`top_n_limit`) then `b`.`points` else 0 end AS `fl_bonus` from ((((((`formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `rr`.`race_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`base_drivers` `bd` on(`bd`.`driver_id` = `rr`.`driver_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`season_scoring` `sc` on(`sc`.`year` = `s`.`year`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`points_scheme` `ps` on(`ps`.`scheme` = `sc`.`scheme` and `ps`.`position` = `rr`.`position`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`points_bonus_fastlap` `b` on(`b`.`scheme` = `sc`.`scheme`)) left join (select `formula1agodb`.`mt`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`formula1agodb`.`mt`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id` from `formula1agodb`.`mt` where `formula1agodb`.`mt`.`position` = 1) `fl` on(`fl`.`race_id` = `rr`.`race_id`)) where `rr`.`position` is not null and `rr`.`position` > 0

v_race_points_shared.view_definition: select `rpr`.`season` AS `season`,`rpr`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`rpr`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`rpr`.`forename` AS `forename`,`rpr`.`surname` AS `surname`,`rpr`.`teams_name` AS `teams_name`,`rpr`.`position` AS `position`,`rpr`.`base_points` AS `base_points`,`rpr`.`fl_bonus` AS `fl_bonus`,coalesce(`sr`.`share_ratio`,1.0) AS `share_ratio`,(`rpr`.`base_points` + `rpr`.`fl_bonus`) * coalesce(`sr`.`share_ratio`,1.0) AS `points` from (`formula1agodb`.`v_race_points_raw` `rpr` left join `formula1agodb`.`v_share_ratio` `sr` on(`sr`.`race_id` = `rpr`.`race_id` and `sr`.`driver_id` = `rpr`.`driver_id`))

v_race_results.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`s`.`round` AS `round`,`rr`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`rr`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`bd`.`forename` AS `forename`,`bd`.`name` AS `surname`,`rr`.`position` AS `position`,`rr`.`laps_completed` AS `laps_completed`,`rr`.`delta` AS `delta`,`rr`.`ab` AS `ab`,`rr`.`teams_name` AS `teams_name`,`rr`.`motor_name` AS `motor_name` from ((`formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `rr`.`race_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`base_drivers` `bd` on(`bd`.`driver_id` = `rr`.`driver_id`))

v_race_sessions.view_definition: select `se`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`se`.`session_type` AS `session_type`,count(0) AS `nb_rows`,min(`se`.`position`) AS `best_pos`,min(`se`.`best_lap_ms`) AS `best_ms` from `formula1agodb`.`v_all_sessions` `se` group by `se`.`race_id`,`se`.`session_type` order by `se`.`race_id`,`se`.`session_type`

v_season_constructor_standings.view_definition: select `rp`.`season` AS `season`,`rr`.`teams_name` AS `constructor`,sum(`rp`.`points`) AS `points`,sum(`rr`.`position` = 1) AS `wins`,count(0) AS `starts` from (`formula1agodb`.`v_race_points` `rp` join `formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` on(`rr`.`race_id` = `rp`.`race_id` and `rr`.`driver_id` = `rp`.`driver_id`)) group by `rp`.`season`,`rr`.`teams_name` order by `rp`.`season`,sum(`rp`.`points`) desc,sum(`rr`.`position` = 1) desc

v_season_driver_standings.view_definition: select `rp`.`season` AS `season`,`rp`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,max(`rp`.`forename`) AS `forename`,max(`rp`.`surname`) AS `surname`,sum(`rp`.`points`) AS `points`,sum(`rp`.`position` = 1) AS `wins`,sum(`rp`.`position` <= 3) AS `podiums`,count(0) AS `starts`,coalesce(`p`.`poles`,0) AS `poles`,coalesce(`f`.`fastlaps`,0) AS `fastlaps` from ((`formula1agodb`.`v_race_points` `rp` left join `formula1agodb`.`v_season_poles` `p` on(`p`.`season` = `rp`.`season` and `p`.`driver_id` = `rp`.`driver_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`v_season_fastlaps` `f` on(`f`.`season` = `rp`.`season` and `f`.`driver_id` = `rp`.`driver_id`)) group by `rp`.`season`,`rp`.`driver_id` order by `rp`.`season`,sum(`rp`.`points`) desc,sum(`rp`.`position` = 1) desc,sum(`rp`.`position` <= 3) desc

v_season_driver_totals.view_definition: select `v_driver_points_tagged`.`season` AS `season`,`v_driver_points_tagged`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,max(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`forename`) AS `forename`,max(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`surname`) AS `surname`,sum(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`points`) AS `points_sur`,sum(case when `v_driver_points_tagged`.`rk_in_seg` <= `v_driver_points_tagged`.`best_n` then `v_driver_points_tagged`.`points` else 0 end) AS `points_effectifs`,sum(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`position` = 1) AS `wins`,sum(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`position` <= 3) AS `podiums`,count(0) AS `starts` from `formula1agodb`.`v_driver_points_tagged` group by `v_driver_points_tagged`.`season`,`v_driver_points_tagged`.`driver_id` order by `v_driver_points_tagged`.`season`,sum(case when `v_driver_points_tagged`.`rk_in_seg` <= `v_driver_points_tagged`.`best_n` then `v_driver_points_tagged`.`points` else 0 end) desc,sum(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`position` = 1) desc,sum(`v_driver_points_tagged`.`position` <= 3) desc

v_season_fastlaps.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`m`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,sum(`m`.`position` = 1) AS `fastlaps` from (`formula1agodb`.`mt` `m` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `m`.`race_id`)) group by `s`.`year`,`m`.`driver_id`

v_season_poles.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`g`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,sum(`g`.`position` = 1) AS `poles` from (`formula1agodb`.`grille` `g` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `g`.`race_id`)) group by `s`.`year`,`g`.`driver_id`

v_season_races.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`s`.`round` AS `round`,`s`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`s`.`date` AS `date`,`c`.`name` AS `circuit` from (`formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` left join `formula1agodb`.`circuits` `c` on(`c`.`circuit_id` = `s`.`circuitid`)) order by `s`.`year`,`s`.`round`

v_season_races_winners.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`s`.`round` AS `round`,`s`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`s`.`date` AS `date`,`c`.`name` AS `circuit`,`c`.`country` AS `country`,`rr`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`bd`.`forename` AS `forename`,`bd`.`name` AS `surname`,`rr`.`teams_name` AS `teams_name` from (((`formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` left join `formula1agodb`.`circuits` `c` on(`c`.`circuit_id` = `s`.`circuitid`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` on(`rr`.`race_id` = `s`.`race_id` and `rr`.`position` = 1)) left join `formula1agodb`.`base_drivers` `bd` on(`bd`.`driver_id` = `rr`.`driver_id`)) order by `s`.`year`,`s`.`round`

v_session_results.view_definition: select `s`.`year` AS `season`,`s`.`round` AS `round`,`se`.`session_type` collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS `session_type`,`se`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`se`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,`bd`.`forename` AS `forename`,`bd`.`name` AS `surname`,`se`.`team` AS `team`,`se`.`position` AS `position`,`se`.`best_lap_time_raw` AS `best_lap_time_raw`,`se`.`best_lap_ms` AS `best_lap_ms`,case when `se`.`best_lap_ms` is null or `m`.`min_ms` is null or `m`.`min_ms` = 0 then NULL else round((`se`.`best_lap_ms` - `m`.`min_ms`) / `m`.`min_ms` * 100,3) end AS `gap_pct` from (((`formula1agodb`.`v_all_sessions` `se` join `formula1agodb`.`seances` `s` on(`s`.`race_id` = `se`.`race_id`)) left join `formula1agodb`.`base_drivers` `bd` on(`bd`.`driver_id` = `se`.`driver_id`)) left join (select `v_all_sessions`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`v_all_sessions`.`session_type` collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci AS `session_type`,min(`v_all_sessions`.`best_lap_ms`) AS `min_ms` from `formula1agodb`.`v_all_sessions` where `v_all_sessions`.`best_lap_ms` is not null group by `v_all_sessions`.`race_id`,`v_all_sessions`.`session_type`) `m` on(`m`.`race_id` = `se`.`race_id` and `m`.`session_type` = `se`.`session_type` collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci))

v_shared_groups.view_definition: select `rr`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,coalesce(`rr`.`num_car`,concat(`rr`.`teams_name`,'#',`rr`.`position`)) AS `car_key`,count(0) AS `n_drivers`,sum(coalesce(`rr`.`laps_completed`,0)) AS `total_laps` from `formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` group by `rr`.`race_id`,coalesce(`rr`.`num_car`,concat(`rr`.`teams_name`,'#',`rr`.`position`)) having count(0) > 1

v_share_ratio.view_definition: select `rr`.`race_id` AS `race_id`,`rr`.`driver_id` AS `driver_id`,case when `g`.`n_drivers` is null then 1.0 when `g`.`total_laps` > 0 then coalesce(`rr`.`laps_completed`,0) / `g`.`total_laps` else 1.0 / `g`.`n_drivers` end AS `share_ratio` from (`formula1agodb`.`results_race` `rr` left join `formula1agodb`.`v_shared_groups` `g` on(`g`.`race_id` = `rr`.`race_id` and coalesce(`rr`.`num_car`,concat(`rr`.`teams_name`,'#',`rr`.`position`)) = `g`.`car_key`))
